    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default Updatable
    EntitySpawnerContainer.callEntitySpawners()
    Call the Updatable.update(long) of all instances of EntitySpawner that were added to this EntitySpawnerContainer.
    default Updatable
    TimerContainer.callTimers()
    Return an Updatable that, when called, call all the timers that were added to this TimerContainer.
    default Updatable
    UpdateExposer.exposedUpdate()
    Delegates the Updatable.update(long) to the UpdateExposer.explicitUpdate(long).

    Newtonian.addSimplePhysics()

    Return an Updatable that checks if any of the boundaries has been crossed on each Updatable.update(long)

    SceneBorderTouchingWatcher.watchForBoundaryTouching()
